title: Millions to be worse off in 2022, says think tank
content: An economic research group says many people will see their living standards fall over the next year.

title: Millions to be worse off in 2022, says think tank
content: An economic research group says many people will see their living standards fall over the next year.

title: Rishi Sunak's Budget claims fact-checked
content: Checking claims about air travel, alcohol taxes, debt and low pay.

title: Man sentenced for threats to Labour deputy leader
content: Benjamin Iliffe sent MP Angela Rayner an email telling her to "watch your back and your kids".

title: Sunak defends air tax changes in Budget
content: Labour says making flying cheaper in the UK is an "astonishing" move ahead of COP26 climate summit.

title: Woman admits email threats to Bradford MP
content: Naz Shah MP says her children were forced to flee the family home after she received death threats.

title: EU 'vanity projects' in Wales attacked by minister
content: Welsh secretary says vast sums of cash were wasted on schemes that failed to tackle poverty.

title: UK boat detained by France amid fishing rights row
content: A minister says his officials are "urgently" investigating the situation surrounding the detained boat.
